predicate.note: Frames file for 'pronounce' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to speak or utter in a certain way

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Warren pronounces the Litchfield case `` your typical demonic infestation . ''
example.arg: the Litchfield case `` your typical demonic infestation

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The demise of Merkur ( pronounced [*] mare-COOR ) comes after a September in which 670 Merkur dealers managed [*-1] to sell only 93 Scorpios [*T*-2] .
